Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Pentecost:

Text.Language: Afsenaf e~p~swi e~t~ve: n~te t~ve caniman~sai: hina n~tefouwrp nan m~piparakl/ton: Pip~meuma n~te ]meym/i.
He ascended into the heaven of heavens toward the East to send us the Paraclete, the Spirit of truth.
صعد إلي سماء السماء ناحية المشارق لكي يرسل لنا المعزي روح الحق
All/louia a#l# a#l#: Pi,~rictoc aftwnf ouoh afsenaf afouwrp nan m~piparakl/ton: cw] m~mon ouoh nai nan.
Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia. Christ is risen and has ascended; He sent to us the Paraclete.Save us and have mercy upon us.
الليلويا الليلويا. المسيح قام ثم صعد، وارسل لنا البارقليط. خلصنا وارحمنا.
